definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: † [[אַפְּתׂם]] or [[אַפְּתוֹם]] (so edd.: > Gi Baer [v. p. 102 f.] from MSS, [[אַפְּתׂס]]) Ezr 4:13 [[מַלְכִים]] ´[[וְא]]: [[תְּהַנְוִק]]; of uncertain mng.: Thes Naug:JBW 1853, 156 in the end (from Pehlevi afdom, Pers. qd0m end); Scheft:79 treasuries (from Zend pathmā,  pl. of pathma, treasury, √ path, to fill up), will endamage the treasuries of kings.
